body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
 policy-map Count-Policy
  class Tos0
  set qos-group 0
  set mpls  experimental topmost 0
   set precedence critical
  priority level 1
 end-policy-map
commit
end"
  }
}
